item.title: Changelog 2022-12-14
item.description: - Added the "open content" badge - Fixed some broken links - Added wiby to the recommended search engines - Added another image to the setup section :x

item.title: Changelog 2022-12-13 (HUGE UPDATE)
item.description: - Changed basically everything, I hope you guys like the new design lolz

item.title: Changelog 2022-12-04
item.description: - Changed some icons on the index page, fixed and optimized blurry images - Updated setup section - Updated comparisons section (search engine, browser, git) - Updated matrix section - Added elpengu to other_sites - Added github link on index page - I stopped hosting mirrors

item.title: Changelog 2022-10-01
item.description: - Started hosting cinny (chat.beparanoid.de) - Updated the setup section - Removed the webhosting section

item.title: Changelog 2022-08-16
item.description: - Main site is back - Cloudtube got replaced with Invidious - Started hosting a mirror of my github (git.beparanoid.de) - i2pd segfaults all the time so for now my I2P services are down - The onion address got updated, remove the old one if you have it bookmarked - There is a new Matrix room

item.title: Changelog 2022-08-05
item.description: - !!! Started hosting mirrors of Gentoo, Parabola and Libreboot !!! - My I2P hidden services are back - Added Falkon and Abrowser to the browser comparisons section - Updated the instances section - Updated the setup section - Fixed some issues with the CSS, the website should look good on small monitors now - Updated the Minecraft server to 1.19.1

item.title: Changelog 2022-07-26
item.description: - Moved the homeserver to FreeBSD 13.1 since OpenBSD caused multiple issues, sorry for the downtime : / - Nitter works again

item.title: Changelog 2022-07-25
item.description: - Updated the homeserver to OpenBSD 7.2-beta - Fixed issues with the Tor mirror, it works again - Replaced Libreddit with Teddit since it seems to be lighter on system resources - Added Session to the IM comparisons

item.title: Changelog 2022-07-21
item.description: - Started hosting a 1.19 Minecraft server - Updated the Matrix contact - Replaced GNUTube with CloudTube - Removed qorg11's website from other sites - Updated the css - Updated the instances section - Stopped hosting I2P mirrors since it caused issues

item.title: Changelog 2022-07-16
item.description: - !!! Moved the homeserver to OpenBSD !!! - Updated the design of the website - Added git services to comparisons - Updated almost all of the sites - Changed contact e-mail to hnhx@danwin1210.de - Added the WTFPL license

item.title: Changelog 2022-06-14
item.description: - Updated the index page - Added qorg11.net to other sites - Updated the instances section - Updated the CSS - Fixed a security issue in the webhosting section

item.title: Changelog 2022-06-04
item.description: - Updated the comparisons section - Added chaox.ro to other sites - Updated the setup section - Updated the ToS for webhosting (/tos.txt) - I tried hosting ProxiTok but the whole project is so broken it doesn't work - Added Matrix space to the index page

item.title: Changelog 2022-05-29
item.description: - Started hosting a Librebin instance (check /instances.xhtml) - Renamed webring to other sites - Updated the setup section - Fixed icon for SimplyTranslate

item.title: Changelog 2022-05-22
item.description: - Added RSS feed - Started hosting a SimplyTranslate instance (check /instances.xhtml) - Fixed URL for the Shadow wiki in the webring - Added CalyxVPN to the VPN comparisons list - Fixed some CSS issues on the webhosting page
